item.description:
First off thanks for all of you who came out to last week's incubator, the Lost Marbles show, and any of the other events from the Boston Improv Festival.

Now up up and away!

It's a bird, it's a plane, it's a box falling from the sky, what's inside it??

Come out this week and we will be doing some more object and environment work in our improv scenes.

Remember no experience required, drag a friend out and come for the atmosphere but stick around to laugh and smile!! I encourage all of you who haven't made it out yet to make this the week!! We don't bite, unless of course we are playing a rabid dog on stage, lol.

$3 donation to cover the cost of renting the space...

Any questions, just send them my way!!

Cya you all soon!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.name: Improvman IV: The Quest for Spontaneity!!
